name: ProtonMail Bridge (Headless)
description: Runs Proton Mail Bridge in headless (CLI) mode inside an LXC, and exposes IMAP and SMTP to other VMs/hosts on your LAN using socat port forwarding. Intended for homelab mail syncing where clients cannot run the Bridge locally.

notes.text: One-time setup (inside the container): sudo -u protonbridge protonmail-bridge -c, then run `login` and `info` to retrieve per-client IMAP/SMTP credentials.
LAN ports exposed by this script: IMAP on 143 forwards to Bridge 127.0.0.1:1143, SMTP on 587 forwards to Bridge 127.0.0.1:1025.
Security: This exposes your Bridge endpoints to the network. Restrict access using Proxmox firewall rules or a trusted VLAN.
